response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. It's a valuable asset that I believe would greatly benefit you. Considering its worth and the value it holds for you, I am offering it to you for $14,000. This price not only reflects its true value but also allows us to come to an agreement that benefits both parties. I look forward to hearing your response soon. Best regards, Alice", "product_price": 14000}
